author: Langemets, Margit
fulltext: oai:oai.datacite.org:8926650;2019-01-22T12:02:20Z;ESTDOI;ESTDOI.KEEL;Eesti õigekeelsussõnaraamat ÕS 2013;Dictionary of Standard Estonian ÕS 2013;Langemets, Margit;Center of Estonian Language Resources;2016;Issued: 2016-08-30;Updated: 2016-08-30;doi:10.15155/3-00-0000-0000-0000-05932L;Abstract;Kajastab kehtivat eesti kirjakeele normi.;Abstract;ÕS 2013 is a normative dictionary of modern standard Estonian, giving recommendations on correct language use. It contains recommended spellings and the morphology of words, instructions on pronunciation and semantics, also some syntactic recommendations. Abbreviations, geographical names and instruction on pronouncing foreign names are attached.
name: 59dde0e1-05a0-5b58-9e5a-c01c8cce74d2
notes: ÕS 2013 is a normative dictionary of modern standard Estonian, giving recommendations on correct language use. It contains recommended spellings and the morphology of words, instructions on pronunciation and semantics, also some syntactic recommendations. Abbreviations, geographical names and instruction on pronouncing foreign names are attached.
title: Eesti õigekeelsussõnaraamat ÕS 2013
Dictionary of Standard Estonian ÕS 2013
